com.radixdlt.client.application.translate.tokens

Class TokenUnitConversions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radixdlt.client.application.translate.tokens.TokenUnitConversions

  • public final class TokenUnitConversions
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for converting token units between UInt256 and BigDecimal

      • subunitsToUnits

        public static java.math.BigDecimal subunitsToUnits(UInt256 subunits)
        Returns the specified number of subunits as a fractional number of units. This method effectively calculates:
        subunits × 10-SUB_UNITS_POW_10
        Parameters:
        subunits - The number of subunits to convert to fractional units
        Returns:
        The number of fractional units represented by subunits
        See Also:
        SUB_UNITS_POW_10

      • unitsToSubunits

        public static UInt256 unitsToSubunits(long units)
        Returns the specified number of units as a UInt256 number of of subunits. This method effectively calculates:
        units × 10SUB_UNITS_POW_10
        Parameters:
        units - The number of units to convert to subunits
        Returns:
        The integer number of subunits represented by units
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if units is less than zero
        See Also:
        SUB_UNITS_POW_10

      • unitsToSubunits

        public static UInt256 unitsToSubunits(java.math.BigDecimal units)
        Returns the specified number of units as a UInt256 number of of subunits. This method effectively calculates:
        units × 10SUB_UNITS_POW_10
        Parameters:
        units - The number of units to convert to subunits
        Returns:
        The integer number of subunits represented by units
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if units is less than zero or greater than UInt256.MAX_VALUE
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - if units × 10SUB_UNITS_POW_10 has a nonzero fractional part.
        See Also:
        SUB_UNITS_POW_10
